scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run start-prod
scripts.stage: npm run build && npm run start-stage
scripts.git-update: git fetch && git reset --hard origin/master && git pull
scripts.delete-pm2-prod: pm2 delete $(node -e 'const ecosystem = require("./ecosystem-prod.config.js"); console.log(ecosystem.apps[0].name);' | tail -n 1)
scripts.restart-pm2-prod: npm run delete-pm2-prod && npm run prod
scripts.git-update-and-restart: npm run git-update && npm ci && npm run restart-pm2-prod
